name: show_attributes
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(MXPro_Labor_GES_percent)*> <*CTX( Container(MXPro_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Editable) )*> <*CTX( Container(MXPro_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MXPro_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MXPro_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MXPro_Labor_Container).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MXPro_Labor_Container).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MXPro_Labor_Container).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>

<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(MXPro_Labor_GES_percent_adc)*> <*CTX( Container(MXPro_Labor_Additional_Cust_Deliverables_con).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Editable) )*> <*CTX( Container(MXPro_Labor_Additional_Cust_Deliverables_con).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MXPro_Labor_Additional_Cust_Deliverables_con).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MXPro_Labor_Additional_Cust_Deliverables_con).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MXPro_Labor_Additional_Cust_Deliverables_con).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MXPro_Labor_Additional_Cust_Deliverables_con).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MXPro_Labor_Additional_Cust_Deliverables_con).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>
